DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess efficacy amoxicillin-clavulanate treat acute otitis medium child . The primary end point time disappearance middle ear effusion monitor daily tympanometry perform family study physician .
DOC.brief_title: Amoxicillin-clavulanate Treating Acute Otitis Media Evaluated Daily Tympanometry
DOC.criteria: Children acute otitis medium Amoxicillin allergy Tympanic membrane perforation Tympanostomy tube ( current ) Complication acute otitis medium mastoiditis
